privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.metadataDescription: Discover how your data is collected, used, and protected when engaging with Iker Romero's web design services.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: When using my website, you may be asked to provide certain personal information to contact me. The data I collect are:
list: Any message you wish to include when contacting me

useOfData.title: Use of Data
useOfData.description: I collect these data exclusively for:
list: Directly communicating with you if you wish to hire my services.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: To manage the information collected, I use MongoDB, which helps me securely store contact information. Additionally, to ensure I am aware of requests, I use Gmail and Nodemailer to send automatic notifications to my professional email. I do not share your data with third parties beyond the mentioned tools, which are essential for the operation of my website.

security.title: Security
security.description: I am committed to ensuring that your information is secure. I continuously seek to implement and improve my security procedures to ensure the safety of the data I collect.

description.part1: In accordance with Spanish and European legislation, I grant you the rights of Access, Rectification, Cancellation, and Opposition (ARCO rights). If you wish to exercise these rights, you can send me an email at
description.part2: . To ensure the authenticity of the request, you must do so from the email you initially used on my site.

durationOfDataRetention.title: Duration of Data Retention
durationOfDataRetention.description: I retain the data indefinitely. However, you can request its deletion at any time.

changesToThePrivacyPolicy.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
changesToThePrivacyPolicy.description: I may update this Privacy Policy as needed. Any updates or changes will be posted on this page for your reference.
